      1 +# ğŸ¯ Syntax Highlighting Architecture - Production Solution
      2 +
      3 +## **Problem Analysis**
      4 +
      5 +### **Root Causes Identified:**
      6 +
      7 +1. **Dependency Chain Issues**: Prism language components have dependencies (e.g., `cpp` requires `clike`)
      8 +2. **Async Loading Race Conditions**: Using `defer` causes unpredictable loading order
      9 +3. **Over-engineering**: Custom retry logic fights against Prism's design
     10 +4. **CDN Reliability**: Mixed CDNs and individual component loading
     11 +
     12 +---
     13 +
     14 +## **Enterprise-Grade Solution**
     15 +
     16 +### **Architectural Principles:**
     17 +
     18 +1. âœ… **Use Library APIs as Designed** - Don't fight the framework
     19 +2. âœ… **Single Responsibility** - Let each component do its job
     20 +3. âœ… **Dependency Injection** - Proper initialization sequence
     21 +4. âœ… **Graceful Degradation** - Handle failures elegantly
     22 +5. âœ… **Scalability** - Support unlimited languages without code changes
     23 +
     24 +---
     25 +
     26 +## **Solution: Prism Autoloader Pattern**
     27 +
     28 +### **Why Autoloader?**
     29 +
     30 +Prism's autoloader plugin is specifically designed to:
     31 +
     32 +- âœ… Handle language dependencies automatically
     33 +- âœ… Load languages on-demand (better performance)
     34 +- âœ… Support 200+ languages without configuration
     35 +- âœ… Cache loaded languages
     36 +- âœ… Handle CDN paths correctly
     37 +
     38 +### **Architecture Diagram:**
     39 +
     40 +````
     41 +â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
     42 +â”‚           Browser Page Load                     â”‚

     45 +                 â–¼

     93 +````
     94 +
     95 +---
     96 +
     97 +## **Implementation Strategy**
     98 +
     99 +### **Phase 1: Simplify HTML (1 line change)**
    100 +
    101 +**Before (Fragile):**
    102 +
    103 +```html
    104 +<!-- 30+ individual script tags -->
    105 +<script src=".../prism-java.min.js"></script>
    106 +<script src=".../prism-cpp.min.js"></script>
    107 +<!-- ... -->
    108 +```
    109 +
    110 +**After (Robust):**
    111 +
    112 +```html
    113 +<!-- Just 2 scripts -->
    114 +<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/prismjs@1.29.0/prism.min.js"></script>
    115 +<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/prismjs@1.29.0/plugins/autoloader/prism-autoloader.min.js"></script>
    116 +```
    117 +
    118 +---
    119 +
    120 +### **Phase 2: Configure Autoloader Properly**
    121 +
    122 +```javascript
    123 +// In initializeApp()
    124 +if (typeof Prism !== 'undefined' && Prism.plugins && Prism.plugins.autoloader) {
    125 +  Prism.plugins.autoloader.languages_path =
    126 +    'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/prismjs@1.29.0/components/';
    127 +}
    128 +```
    129 +
    130 +---
    131 +
    132 +### **Phase 3: Simplify PrismService**
    133 +
    134 +**Remove custom retry logic. Use Prism's native API:**
    135 +
    136 +```javascript
    137 +export class PrismService {
    138 +  highlightAll(container) {
    139 +    if (!this.isPrismLoaded()) {
    140 +      console.warn('Prism library not loaded');
    141 +      return 0;
    142 +    }
    143 +
    144 +    // Use Prism's native method - it's battle-tested
    145 +    Prism.highlightAllUnder(container);
    146 +
    147 +    return container.querySelectorAll('pre code[class*="language-"]').length;
    148 +  }
    149 +}
    150 +```
    151 +
    152 +---
    153 +
    154 +## **Benefits of This Architecture**
    155 +
    156 +### **1. Scalability**
    157 +
    158 +- âœ… Supports 200+ languages without code changes
    159 +- âœ… Add new languages by just typing ` ```languagename`
    160 +- âœ… Zero configuration needed
    161 +
    162 +### **2. Performance**
    163 +
    164 +- âœ… Lazy loading - only loads languages when needed
    165 +- âœ… Browser caching - languages load once
    166 +- âœ… Parallel loading - non-blocking
    167 +
    168 +### **3. Maintainability**
    169 +
    170 +- âœ… Uses Prism's tested APIs
    171 +- âœ… No custom retry/polling logic
    172 +- âœ… Single source of truth (autoloader)
    173 +- âœ… Easy to update Prism version
    174 +
    175 +### **4. Reliability**
    176 +
    177 +- âœ… Handles dependencies automatically
    178 +- âœ… Proper error handling built-in
    179 +- âœ… CDN fallbacks
    180 +- âœ… Works offline with cached scripts
    181 +
    182 +### **5. Future-Proof**
    183 +
    184 +- âœ… New Prism versions work automatically
    185 +- âœ… New languages supported without updates
    186 +- âœ… No breaking changes needed
    187 +
    188 +---
    189 +
    190 +## **Error Handling Strategy**
    191 +
    192 +### **Graceful Degradation:**
    193 +
    194 +```javascript
    195 +class PrismService {
    196 +  highlightAll(container) {
    197 +    try {
    198 +      if (!this.isPrismLoaded()) {
    199 +        // Degrade to unstyled code blocks
    200 +        console.warn('Syntax highlighting unavailable');
    201 +        return 0;
    202 +      }
    203 +
    204 +      Prism.highlightAllUnder(container);
    205 +      return this.getHighlightedCount(container);
    206 +    } catch (error) {
    207 +      // Log but don't break the app
    208 +      console.error('Syntax highlighting error:', error);
    209 +      return 0;
    210 +    }
    211 +  }
    212 +}
    213 +```
    214 +
    215 +---
    216 +
    217 +## **Testing Strategy**
    218 +
    219 +### **Unit Tests:**
    220 +
    221 +```javascript
    222 +describe('PrismService', () => {
    223 +  it('should highlight code when Prism is loaded', () => {
    224 +    const service = new PrismService();
    225 +    const container = createTestContainer();
    226 +    const count = service.highlightAll(container);
    227 +    expect(count).toBeGreaterThan(0);
    228 +  });
    229 +
    230 +  it('should handle missing Prism gracefully', () => {
    231 +    window.Prism = undefined;
    232 +    const service = new PrismService();
    233 +    expect(() => service.highlightAll(container)).not.toThrow();
    234 +  });
    235 +});
    236 +```
    237 +
    238 +### **Integration Tests:**
    239 +

    242 +- Test performance with large documents
    243 +
    244 +---
    245 +
    246 +## **Monitoring & Observability**
    247 +
    248 +### **Metrics to Track:**
    249 +

    251 +// Track which languages are being used
    252 +const languageUsage = {};
    253 +
    254 +Prism.hooks.add('before-highlight', function (env) {
    255 +  const lang = env.language;
    256 +  languageUsage[lang] = (languageUsage[lang] || 0) + 1;
    257 +});
    258 +
    259 +// Log to analytics
    260 +console.log('Most used languages:', languageUsage);
    261 +```
    262 +
    263 +---
    264 +
    265 +## **Migration Path**
    266 +
    267 +### **Step 1: Update HTML**

      1 +# ğŸ§ª Local Testing Guide - Markdown Viewer Pro
      2 +
      3 +## **Quick Start (2 minutes)**
      4 +
      5 +```bash
      6 +# 1. Install dependencies
      7 +npm install
      8 +
      9 +# 2. Start development server
     10 +npm run dev
     11 +
     12 +# 3. Open browser
     13 +# Navigate to: http://localhost:5173
     14 +```
     15 +
     16 +---
     17 +
     18 +## **Detailed Step-by-Step Guide**
     19 +
     20 +### **Prerequisites**
     21 +
     22 +- **Node.js 18+** and **npm** installed
     23 +- Modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
     24 +
     25 +Check your versions:
     26 +
     27 +```bash
     28 +node --version  # Should be 18.0.0 or higher
     29 +npm --version   # Should be 8.0.0 or higher
     30 +```
     31 +
     32 +---
     33 +
     34 +### **Step 1: Installation**
     35 +
     36 +```bash
     37 +# Navigate to project directory
     38 +cd markdown-viewer-app
     39 +
     40 +# Install all dependencies
     41 +npm install
     42 +
     43 +# Expected output: All packages installed successfully
     44 +```
     45 +
     46 +**Dependencies Installed:**
     47 +
     48 +- Vite (build tool)
     49 +- Vitest (testing framework)
     50 +- ESLint (code linting)
     51 +- Prettier (code formatting)
     52 +- JSDOM (DOM testing)
     53 +- Coverage tools
     54 +
     55 +---
     56 +
     57 +### **Step 2: Run Development Server**
     58 +
     59 +```bash
     60 +npm run dev
     61 +```

     74 +

     77 +- Watches for file changes
     78 +- Auto-reloads browser on changes

### âœ¨ `docs/09-temp/syntax-highlighting-analysis.md` **[ADDED]**

**Status:** âœ… **NEW FILE** - This file has been newly created

**Type:** Documentation ğŸ“–

```diff
@@ -0,0 +1,363 @@
      1 +# ğŸ” Syntax Highlighting Issue - Root Cause Analysis
      2 +
      3 +## **Problem Statement**
      4 +
      5 +Code blocks with language identifiers like `cpp,`java, etc. are not being syntax highlighted.
      6 +
      7 +---
      8 +
      9 +## **Current Architecture Flow**
     10 +
     11 +### **1. HTML Loading Sequence**
     12 +
     13 +```html
     14 +<!-- Core Prism -->
     15 +<script src="...prism.min.js" defer></script>
     16 +
     17 +<!-- Language Components (loaded separately) -->
     18 +<script src="...prism-java.min.js" defer></script>
     19 +<script src="...prism-cpp.min.js" defer></script>
     20 +<script src="...prism-python.min.js" defer></script>
     21 +<!-- ... only 8 languages loaded -->
     22 +```
     23 +
     24 +### **2. Script Initialization**
     25 +
     26 +```javascript
     27 +// script.js
     28 +window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initializeApp);
     29 +
     30 +function initializeApp() {
     31 +  // Checks if Prism is loaded
     32 +  if (typeof Prism === 'undefined') {
     33 +    setTimeout(initializeApp, 100);
     34 +    return;
     35 +  }
     36 +  // Proceeds to setup...
     37 +}
     38 +```
     39 +
     40 +### **3. Markdown Rendering**
     41 +
     42 +```javascript
     43 +function renderMarkdown() {
     44 +  let html = marked.parse(markdownText);
     45 +  preview.innerHTML = html;
     46 +
     47 +  // Highlights code blocks
     48 +  prismService.highlightAll(preview);
     49 +}
     50 +```
     51 +
     52 +### **4. PrismService Highlighting**
     53 +
     54 +```javascript
     55 +highlightAll(container) {
     56 +  const codeBlocks = container.querySelectorAll('pre code');
     57 +  codeBlocks.forEach(block => {
     58 +    Prism.highlightElement(block);
     59 +  });
     60 +}
     61 +```
     62 +
     63 +---
     64 +
     65 +## **Root Causes Identified**
     66 +
     67 +### **ğŸ”´ Issue #1: Race Condition with Language Loading**
     68 +
     69 +**Problem:**
     70 +
     71 +- Core Prism.js loads first
     72 +- Language components (java, cpp, etc.) load asynchronously with `defer`
     73 +- Script checks `typeof Prism !== 'undefined'` âœ… (core loaded)
     74 +- But language-specific components may NOT be loaded yet âŒ
     75 +- When highlighting runs, `Prism.languages.cpp` might be `undefined`
     76 +
     77 +**Evidence:**
     78 +
     79 +```javascript
     80 +// initializeApp only checks if Prism exists
     81 +if (typeof Prism === 'undefined') { ... }
     82 +
     83 +// Does NOT check if Prism.languages.cpp exists!
     84 +```
     85 +
     86 +---
     87 +
     88 +### **ğŸ”´ Issue #2: Limited Language Support**
     89 +
     90 +**Problem:**
     91 +Only 8 languages explicitly loaded:
     92 +
     93 +- âœ… Java, C++, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Rust, Go, SQL
     94 +- âŒ Missing: C, C#, PHP, Ruby, Swift, Kotlin, Shell/Bash, HTML, CSS, JSON, YAML, etc.
     95 +
     96 +**Impact:**
     97 +
     98 +- User types ```csharp â†’ No highlighting
     99 +- User types ```bash â†’ No highlighting
    100 +- User types ```html â†’ No highlighting
    101 +
    102 +---
    103 +
    104 +### **ğŸ”´ Issue #3: No Language Validation**
    105 +
    106 +**Problem:**
    107 +
    108 +```javascript
    109 +Prism.highlightElement(block);
    110 +```
    111 +
    112 +**This silently fails if:**
    113 +
    114 +- Language not loaded
    115 +- Invalid language name
    116 +- Prism.languages[lang] is undefined
    117 +
    118 +**No error feedback to user!**
    119 +
    120 +---
    121 +
    122 +### **ğŸ”´ Issue #4: Class Name Format**
    123 +
    124 +**Verification Needed:**
    125 +
    126 +Marked.js generates:
    127 +
    128 +```html
    129 +<pre><code class="language-cpp">...</code></pre>
    130 +```
    131 +
    132 +Prism expects:
    133 +
    134 +```html
    135 +<pre><code class="language-cpp">...</code></pre>
    136 +```
    137 +
    138 +**Status:** âœ… Format matches, but language must be loaded
    139 +
    140 +---
    141 +
    142 +## **Solution Design**
    143 +
    144 +### **Strategy 1: Load All Common Languages (Recommended)**
    145 +
    146 +**Approach:**
    147 +
    148 +- Use Prism's autoloader plugin to load languages on-demand
    149 +- OR bundle all common languages upfront
    150 +
    151 +**Pros:**
    152 +
    153 +- Automatic language detection and loading
    154 +- Supports 100+ languages
    155 +- Zero configuration needed
    156 +
    157 +**Cons:**
    158 +
    159 +- Slightly larger initial bundle (~50KB gzipped)
    160 +
    161 +---
    162 +
    163 +### **Strategy 2: Enhanced Language Loading with Validation**
    164 +
    165 +**Approach:**
    166 +
    167 +```javascript
    168 +// 1. Wait for ALL language scripts to load
    169 +// 2. Validate language exists before highlighting
    170 +// 3. Provide user feedback if language missing
    171 +// 4. Fallback to plain text rendering
    172 +```
    173 +
    174 +**Implementation:**
    175 +
    176 +```javascript
    177 +function ensureLanguagesLoaded() {
    178 +  const requiredLanguages = ['cpp', 'java', 'python', 'javascript'];
    179 +
    180 +  return new Promise(resolve => {
    181 +    const check = () => {
    182 +      const allLoaded = requiredLanguages.every(lang => Prism.languages[lang]);
    183 +
    184 +      if (allLoaded) {
    185 +        resolve();
    186 +      } else {
    187 +        setTimeout(check, 50);
    188 +      }
    189 +    };
    190 +    check();
    191 +  });
    192 +}
    193 +```
    194 +
    195 +---
    196 +
    197 +### **Strategy 3: Use Prism Autoloader (BEST SOLUTION)**
    198 +
    199 +**Implementation:**
    200 +
    201 +```html
    202 +<!-- Replace individual language scripts with autoloader -->
    203 +<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/prism/1.29.0/plugins/autoloader/prism-autoloader.min.js"></script>
    204 +```
    205 +
    206 +**How it works:**
    207 +
    208 +1. User types ```kotlin
    209 +2. Prism detects language needed
    210 +3. Autoloader fetches prism-kotlin.min.js from CDN
    211 +4. Highlighting applies automatically
    212 +
    213 +**Benefits:**
    214 +
    215 +- âœ… Supports ALL 150+ languages
    216 +- âœ… Loads on-demand (smaller initial load)
    217 +- âœ… Zero configuration
    218 +- âœ… Handles rare languages automatically
    219 +
    220 +---
    221 +
    222 +## **Recommended Solution: Three-Phase Fix**
    223 +
    224 +### **Phase 1: Immediate Fix - Add Autoloader (5 minutes)**
    225 +
    226 +**Change index.html:**
    227 +
    228 +```html
    229 +<!-- REMOVE these individual language scripts -->
    230 +<script src=".../prism-java.min.js" defer></script>
    231 +<script src=".../prism-cpp.min.js" defer></script>
    232 +<!-- ... all 8 individual scripts -->
    233 +
    234 +<!-- ADD autoloader plugin -->
    235 +<script
    236 +  src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/prism/1.29.0/plugins/autoloader/prism-autoloader.min.js"
    237 +  defer
    238 +></script>
    239 +```
    240 +
    241 +---
    242 +
    243 +### **Phase 2: Enhanced PrismService with Validation**
    244 +
    245 +**Update PrismService.js:**
    246 +
    247 +```javascript
    248 +highlightElement(block) {
    249 +  if (!this.isPrismLoaded()) {
    250 +    return false;
    251 +  }
    252 +
    253 +  // Extract language from class name
    254 +  const language = this.getLanguageFromClass(block.className);
    255 +
    256 +  // Validate language is loaded
    257 +  if (language && !Prism.languages[language]) {
    258 +    console.warn(`Language '${language}' not loaded yet`);
    259 +    // Add loading indicator
    260 +    block.setAttribute('data-language-loading', language);
    261 +    return false;
    262 +  }
    263 +
    264 +  try {
    265 +    Prism.highlightElement(block);
    266 +    return true;
    267 +  } catch (error) {
    268 +    console.error('Prism highlight error:', error);
    269 +    return false;
    270 +  }
    271 +}
    272 +
    273 +getLanguageFromClass(className) {
    274 +  const match = className.match(/language-(\w+)/);
    275 +  return match ? match[1] : null;
    276 +}
    277 +```
    278 +
    279 +---
    280 +
    281 +### **Phase 3: Add User Feedback**
    282 +
    283 +**Visual indicator when language is loading:**
    284 +
    285 +```css
    286 +pre code[data-language-loading]::before {
    287 +  content: 'Loading ' attr(data-language-loading) ' syntax...';
    288 +  display: block;
    289 +  color: #888;
    290 +  font-size: 0.9em;
    291 +  margin-bottom: 8px;
    292 +}
    293 +```
    294 +
    295 +---
    296 +
    297 +## **Testing Plan**

     21 +
     22 +```python
     23 +def quicksort(arr):
     24 +    if len(arr) <= 1:
     25 +        return arr
     26 +    pivot = arr[len(arr) // 2]
     27 +    left = [x for x in arr if x < pivot]
     28 +    middle = [x for x in arr if x == pivot]
     29 +    right = [x for x in arr if x > pivot]
     30 +    return quicksort(left) + middle + quicksort(right)
     31 +
     32 +print(quicksort([3, 6, 8, 10, 1, 2, 1]))
     33 +```
     34 +

    474 +
    475 +---
    476 +
    477 +## **How It Works**
    478 +
    479 +1. User types ` ```csharp` in markdown
    480 +2. Marked.js generates `<pre><code class="language-csharp">...</code></pre>`
    481 +3. PrismService detects `language-csharp` class
    482 +4. Checks if C# is loaded: `Prism.languages['csharp']`
    483 +5. If not loaded, Prism autoloader fetches it from CDN
    484 +6. PrismService retries highlighting after 200ms
    485 +7. C# code is now beautifully highlighted! ğŸ¨
    486
